name: Solitaire Happy
description:
Solitaire or patience card game to play on your phone or tablet. The addictive card-turning fun is enhanced by our super smooth graphics, in-game hints, and an undo facility. Elements of gameplay and layout can be changed as you prefer.

But there's even more! When you win a game a fantastic photograph is unlocked. Your growing photography collection can be viewed in your gallery, where you can also customise the pictures until they are truly unique!

Features:

15 happy photographs to unlock
Win badges for your best games
Hints and undos
Card-dealing preferences options
Change card-back and playing-surface to suit your game
